data.actual_result: The text "Benutzer" goes outside of the slider and overlaps with other text.
data.expected_result: All of the text of the slider should be part of it.
data.short_description: Part of voice chat's user limit slider text can go outside of the slider
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your User Settings and set your language to German - Create or have any voice channel - Edit this voice channel's settings - Drag the user limit slider
